data.text: @Harini_Iyengar @Harini_Iyengar Hi there, thanks for your message and apologies for any inconvenience - we will share your feedback with the relevant teams.

@DrRafieCecilia @saqibs @DrRafieCecilia @saqibs Hi there, thanks for your message. We take accessibility very seriously and have passed your message on to the relevant teams in the Museum. If you would like to provide more feedback please get in touch via our website: https://t.co/J1VuagCfyg
@jayswanson @jayswanson Hi there, thanks for your message. You can find out more about this object and others in the show here: https://t.co/aax67rAJDQ

@kmarkparker Hi there, thanks for your message. We would suggest contacting the Box Office on (+44)207 323 8181 or at tickets@britishmuseum.org, Mon-Fri, 10.00-16.50 and a member of staff will be happy to help.

Pioneering botanical artist Maria Sibylla Merian was born #OnThisDay in 1647. 

Merian is famed for her colourful combination of art and science in her botanical drawings. 

Find out more about her life and work: https://t.co/4Ua7VBytda https://t.co/YG7MlkBVPY
